TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IApplicationIdentifier

summary.span: 定义应用程序域的标识符，缓存实现可使用这些应用程序域与主机环境进行交互。

span.span: Defines an identifier for application domains that a cache implementation can use to interact with a host environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 主机环境（如 ASP.NET）可以使用 接口来定义标识单个应用程序域的字符串。A .NET Framework host environment such as ASP.NET can use the interface to define strings that identify individual application domains. 宿主环境实现 接口。The host environment implements the interface. 然后，可 通过属性实现此接口 。This interface is then available to implementations through the property. 缓存实现使用此引用获取应用程序域的标识符。A cache implementation uses this reference to obtain an identifier for the application domain. 在 ASP.NET 中，缓存实现使用应用程序标识符来构造缓存性能计数器的标识符。In ASP.NET, cache implementations use the application identifier to construct identifiers for cache performance counters. 这提供了性能计数器实例的名称，当多个应用程序域运行时，这些实例可在应用程序域之间进行区分。This provides names for performance counter instances that can be distinguished between application domains when multiple application domains are running.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetApplicationId() cil managed

summary.span: 获取某个应用程序域的标识符。

span.span: Gets an identifier for an application domain.

returns.span: 当前应用程序域的唯一标识符。

span.span: A unique identifier for the current application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通常由 .NET Framework 主机环境实现，以便为实现构造应用程序标识符 。The method is typically implemented by a .NET Framework host environment in order to construct an application identifier for an implementation. 实现使用此信息来标识当前正在运行的应用程序域。A implementation uses this information to identify the application domain that is currently running. 例如，在 ASP.NET 中，缓存使用应用程序标识符来构造缓存性能计数器的标识符。For example, in ASP.NET, the cache uses an application identifier to construct identifiers for cache performance counters. 缓存调用 由主机环境实现的方法，并且主机返回标识符。The cache calls the method that is implemented by the host environment and the host returns the identifier. 这提供了性能计数器实例的名称，当多个应用程序域运行时，这些实例可在应用程序域之间进行区分。This provides names for performance counter instances that can be distinguished between application domains when multiple application domains are running.
